name: Destiny against your will
description:
Our protagonist feels trapped in an empty life, although he has just left his university opportunities seem to vanish, the country is a mess.

We are in the year 2150, much has changed in the world as we know it, the poles have disappeared, great extinctions have occurred due to global warming.

Embark on the Artic 2 project and discover many mysteries, where you and your team will embark on a sexy and captivating adventure, where nothing is what it seems and where the most important thing is not to be defeated by adversity.

The game is planned to be developed in English and Spanish (right now it is in Spanish and is expected to be available in 2 languages soon)

El juego esta planteado para desarrollarse en ingles y español (ahora mismo esta en español se espera pronto que este disponible en 2 idiomas)
